about_the_game:
In the year 20XX, when Japan's food culture has declined, the last remaining sushi chef rises up!
Opening a sushi restaurant with only one person!


■ Story
20XX, Japanese food culture is fading.
My father, the last sushi craftsman in Japan, was unexpectedly hospitalized.
His words to me were, "Take care of the rest!".
And then, the one-man operation conveyor belt sushi business suddenly starts!

■ Game
- Run a sushi restaurant in 60 seconds per game
- Offer sushi according to the customers' orders
- Increase your restaurant's rating by delivering fresh sushi as soon as possible
- Aim for high scores when your restaurant's rating ups and more customers come.

■ Restaurants
- Prefectures across Japan become the motif for the restaurants
- Each restaurant has a different gimmick reflecting its local impression

■ Sushi
- In addition to the basic Nigiri and Gunkan sushi, each restaurant offers sushi that looks like a local specialty.
- Level up sushi using EXP you earned from offering sushi

■ Avatars
- Change your sushi craftsman's outfit freely with avatar items available in the game

■ Partners
- Bring partners available in the game to the restaurant and activate skills that can benefit you
- A variety of local partners available
